column5: Anyone ever replace their front pedestal seat? I am debating about replacing mine for something more comfortable, offers more support for those long days of trolling. Any recommendations?Thanks
Switched mine out couple years ago...this seat is very comfortable. You can lean and or sit on it. Cabelas signature series pro seat..http://images.cabelas.com/is/image/c...bXJvPDeeG6s1Mv

Would these be comfortable sitting on for 6-8-10 hours a day? Has anyone sat in one of these? Very pricey but might be worth it if it is easy on the butt/back.http://www.cabelas.com/product/Boati...Tz_stype%3DGNU
